data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haitlinger, Ryszard, Kekeunou, Sévilor, Łupicki, Dariusz (2014): Charletonia cameroonensis Haitlinger & Kekeunou sp. nov. and the first record of C. justynae Haitlinger, 1987 (Acari: Erythraeidae) from Cameroon with redescription of the species. Zootaxa 3760 (1): 39-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.1.2
